00020 #include "PointCorrespondenceGenericNN.h"

00022 #include <assert.h>

00024 namespace brics_3d {

00026 PointCorrespondenceGenericNN::PointCorrespondenceGenericNN() {
00027         this->nearestNeighborAlgorithm = 0;
00028 
00029 }
00030 
00031 PointCorrespondenceGenericNN::PointCorrespondenceGenericNN(INearestPoint3DNeighbor* nearestNeighborAlgorithm) {
00032     this->nearestNeighborAlgorithm = nearestNeighborAlgorithm;
00033 }
00034 
00035 PointCorrespondenceGenericNN::~PointCorrespondenceGenericNN() {
00036         if (nearestNeighborAlgorithm != 0) {
00037                 delete nearestNeighborAlgorithm;
00038         }
00039 }
00040 
00041 void PointCorrespondenceGenericNN::createNearestNeighborCorrespondence(PointCloud3D* pointCloud1,
00042                 PointCloud3D* pointCloud2, std::vector<CorrespondencePoint3DPair>* resultPointPairs) {
00043 
00044         assert(nearestNeighborAlgorithm != 0);  // check if algorithm is set up
00045         assert(pointCloud1 != 0);  // check input parameters
00046         assert(pointCloud2 != 0);
00047         assert(resultPointPairs != 0);
00048 
00049         resultPointPairs->clear();
00050 
00051         /* prepare data */
00052         nearestNeighborAlgorithm->setData(pointCloud1);
00053 
00054         /* search for each point in pointCloud2 */
00055         vector<int> resultIndices;
00056         int resultIndex;
00057         int k = 1; //only the nearest neighbor is considered
00058 
00059         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pointCloud2->getSize(); i++) {
00060 
00061                 nearestNeighborAlgorithm->findNearestNeighbors( &(*pointCloud2->getPointCloud())[i], &resultIndices, k);
00062 
00063                 if (resultIndices.size() > 0) {
00064                         resultIndex = resultIndices[0];
00065                         assert (resultIndex < static_cast<int>(pointCloud1->getSize())); //plausibility check if result is in range
00066 
00067                         Point3D firstPoint = Point3D (&((*pointCloud1->getPointCloud())[resultIndex]));
00068                         Point3D secondPoint = Point3D (&((*pointCloud2->getPointCloud())[i]));
00069 
00070                         CorrespondencePoint3DPair foundPair(firstPoint, secondPoint);
00071                         resultPointPairs->push_back(foundPair);
00072                 }
00073         }
00074 }
00075 
00076 INearestPoint3DNeighbor* PointCorrespondenceGenericNN::getNearestNeighborAlgorithm() const {
00077         return nearestNeighborAlgorithm;
00078 }
00079 
00080 void PointCorrespondenceGenericNN::setNearestNeighborAlgorithm(INearestPoint3DNeighbor* nearestNeighborAlgorithm) {
00081         this->nearestNeighborAlgorithm = nearestNeighborAlgorithm;
00082 }
00083 
00084 }
